mods.abstract: Heads of mother and male child are turned three quarter to the right of the picture plane. The woman has an elongated face with narrow slit-like eyes and a short, frizzy 1954 hairdo. She wears a large earring in a pagoda-like shape in the ear that is exposed to view. She also has a high, 1950's type of neckcloth with a poof on the front. The girl has an elongated face similar to her mother's. He also possesses the same upturned nose, pursed lips, and slit-like eyes.

name.namePart: Louisiana State University (Baton Rouge, La.). Museum of Art
